item.title: Software types
item.description: Running a small business requires incredible investment of effort and time, apart from financial considerations. It's hard to find a single business here in York Region, as anywhere else, that does not rely on software to get through the day. Paperwork, taxes, accounting - it would be incredibly cumbersome to handle all those details by hand ...

item.title: Distraction
item.description: Remember that feeling of satisfaction at the end of the day knowing that you took knocked bunch of items off your list. Fells good isn't it? How many of them you carried over the line, because you had a block of uninterrupted time where you could focus, get into the flow and completely destroy it? ...
